languages.text: Флейвор, объясняющий, откуда в коронусе этот шлем

traits.locale_text: Флейвор, объясняющий, откуда в коронусе этот шлем

languages.text: Шлем Ульфара покрыт загадочными фенрисийскими рунами и спиралевидными узорами, взывающими к силе родного мира Космических Волков и повествующих обо всех опасностях, что пережил космодесантник, прежде чем впервые надел силовую броню.

Ulfar's helmet is covered in mysterious Fenrisian runes and spiral patterns that invoke the might of the Space Wolves' homeworld and recount the many perils the Space Marine endured before he first donned his power armour.
languages.original_text: Шлем Ульфара покрыт загадочными фенрисийскими рунами и спиралевидными узорами, взывающими к силе родного мира Космических Волков и повествующих обо всех опасностях, что пережил космодесантник, прежде чем впервые надел силовую броню.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar's helmet is covered in mysterious Fenrisian runes and spiral patterns that invoke the might of the Space Wolves' homeworld and recount the many perils the Space Marine endured before he first donned his power armour.

Ulfar's helmet is covered in mysterious Fenrisian runes and spiral patterns that invoke the might of the Space Wolves' homeworld and recount the many perils the Space Marine endured before he first donned his power armour.

languages.text: ウルファーのヘルメットは、フェンリス文字と渦巻き模様で覆われており、 スペースウルフの故郷の力を呼び起こし、パワーアーマーを初めて纏う前にスペースマリーンが経験した数々の危険を物語っている。
languages.original_text: Ulfar's helmet is covered in mysterious Fenrisian runes and spiral patterns that invoke the might of the Space Wolves' homeworld and recount the many perils the Space Marine endured before he first donned his power armour.

traits.locale_text: ウルファーのヘルメットは、フェンリス文字と渦巻き模様で覆われており、 スペースウルフの故郷の力を呼び起こし、パワーアーマーを初めて纏う前にスペースマリーンが経験した数々の危険を物語っている。

languages.text: Ulfars Helm ist bedeckt mit geheimnisvollen Runen und Spiralmustern von Fenris, die an die Macht der Heimatwelt der Space Wolves gemahnen und die vielen Gefahren in Erinnerung rufen, die der Space Marine meisterte, ehe er das erste Mal seine Energierüstung anlegte.
languages.original_text: Ulfar's helmet is covered in mysterious Fenrisian runes and spiral patterns that invoke the might of the Space Wolves' homeworld and recount the many perils the Space Marine endured before he first donned his power armour.

traits.locale_text: Ulfars Helm ist bedeckt mit geheimnisvollen Runen und Spiralmustern von Fenris, die an die Macht der Heimatwelt der Space Wolves gemahnen und die vielen Gefahren in Erinnerung rufen, die der Space Marine meisterte, ehe er das erste Mal seine Energierüstung anlegte.

languages.text: Le casque d'Ulfar est orné de runes mystérieuses typiques de Fenris, évoquant la puissance de la planète d'origine des Space Wolves. Les spirales, quant à elles, soulignent les nombreux périls que le Space Marine a endurés avant de recevoir son armure énergétique.
languages.original_text: Ulfar's helmet is covered in mysterious Fenrisian runes and spiral patterns that invoke the might of the Space Wolves' homeworld and recount the many perils the Space Marine endured before he first donned his power armour.

traits.locale_text: Le casque d'Ulfar est orné de runes mystérieuses typiques de Fenris, évoquant la puissance de la planète d'origine des Space Wolves. Les spirales, quant à elles, soulignent les nombreux périls que le Space Marine a endurés avant de recevoir son armure énergétique.

languages.text: Ulfar'ın miğferi, gizemli Fenris rünleriyle ve sarmal şeklinde ilerleyen motiflerle süslü. Bu işaretler, bir yandan Uzay Kurtları'nın ana yurdunun kudretini gözler önüne sererken bir yandan da Uzay Piyadesi'nin güç zırhını ilk kez kuşanmadan önce göğüs gerdiği nice tehlikeyi anlatıyor.
languages.original_text: Ulfar's helmet is covered in mysterious Fenrisian runes and spiral patterns that invoke the might of the Space Wolves' homeworld and recount the many perils the Space Marine endured before he first donned his power armour.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar'ın miğferi, gizemli Fenris rünleriyle ve sarmal şeklinde ilerleyen motiflerle süslü. Bu işaretler, bir yandan Uzay Kurtları'nın ana yurdunun kudretini gözler önüne sererken bir yandan da Uzay Piyadesi'nin güç zırhını ilk kez kuşanmadan önce göğüs gerdiği nice tehlikeyi anlatıyor.

languages.text: El casco de Ulfar está cubierto de misteriosas runas fenrisianas y diseños de espiral que evocan la fuerza del mundo natal de los Lobos Espaciales y relatan los peligros que atravesó el Marine Espacial antes de recibir su servoarmadura.
languages.original_text: Ulfar's helmet is covered in mysterious Fenrisian runes and spiral patterns that invoke the might of the Space Wolves' homeworld and recount the many perils the Space Marine endured before he first donned his power armour.

traits.locale_text: El casco de Ulfar está cubierto de misteriosas runas fenrisianas y diseños de espiral que evocan la fuerza del mundo natal de los Lobos Espaciales y relatan los peligros que atravesó el Marine Espacial antes de recibir su servoarmadura.

languages.text: 乌尔法的头盔上覆满了神秘的芬里斯符文与螺旋形图案。这些图案描绘着这位星际战士首次穿上动力护甲前遭遇的诸多危险，可以唤醒太空野狼家园世界的力量。
languages.original_text: Ulfar's helmet is covered in mysterious Fenrisian runes and spiral patterns that invoke the might of the Space Wolves' homeworld and recount the many perils the Space Marine endured before he first donned his power armour.

traits.locale_text: 乌尔法的头盔上覆满了神秘的芬里斯符文与螺旋形图案。这些图案描绘着这位星际战士首次穿上动力护甲前遭遇的诸多危险，可以唤醒太空野狼家园世界的力量。
